CODE.item: * MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
CONCATENATE LV_LTX SY-DATUM+6(2) ',' SY-DATUM+0(4) INTO LV_DATE SEPARATED BY SPACE.

item.TDLINE: Please refer to your letter of resignation dated <C1>
company. I have to inform you, that your resignation has been accepted
with regret and you are relieved at the closing hours of <C1>
Your legal dues will be settled in normal course of time.
I take this opportunity to wish you all the best in your future
